thread.title: Man United star Henrikh Mkhitaryan limps off against St Etienne: Doubt for EFL Cup final
thread.title_full: Man United star Henrikh Mkhitaryan limps off against St Etienne: Doubt for EFL Cup final

title: Man United star Henrikh Mkhitaryan limps off against St Etienne: Doubt for EFL Cup final
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Man United star Henrikh Mkhitaryan limps off against St Etienne: Doubt for EFL Cup final MANCHESTER UNITED star Henrikh Mkhitaryan is a doubt for Sunday’s EFL Cup final after limping off against St Etienne. PUBLISHED: 17:26, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 | UPDATED: 17:44, Wed, Feb 22, 2017 GETTY Manchester United star Henrikh Mkhitaryan limps off against St Etienne 
Mkhitaryan had opened the scoring for Manchester United in this evening’s Europa League tie. 
The Armenian poked home Juan Mata’s cross to put Jose Mourinho’s side 4-0 up on aggregate against the French side. 
But soon after Mkhitaryan was forced to leave the field holding his hamstring. GETTY Henrikh Mkhitaryan had opened the scoring for Man United before he left the field 
He was replaced by Marcus Rashford with 25 minutes gone. 
Mkhitaryan could now be a doubt for Sunday’s EFL Cup final with Southampton. 
Mourinho will now face questions as to whether he needed to play the Armenia international. Man United fans react as Mkhitaryan limps off against Saint-Etienne Wed, February 22, 2017 Express Sport brings you all the best tweets as Mkhitaryan limps off during Manchester United's clash with Saint-Etienne
